speaker: JOHN
text_preview:
Greetings and welcome to the AMD third quarter 2025 conference call. At this time, all participants are in a listen

only mode. A question and answer session will follow the formal presentation. If anyone should require operator

assistance, please press star 0 on your telephone keypad. As a reminder, this conference call is being recorded.

It is now my pleasure to introduce to you Matt Ramsay, VP, Financial Strategy and Investor Relations. Thank you,

Matt. You may begin.
